data.text:
4) 12 January at the Bang Kwang Central Prison, Nonthaburi (Thailand) ex aerumnis carceris

NIKHOLAS BUYKOET KRISBAMRUNG (BENEDIKTO CHUNKIM)

[นิโคลาส บุญเกิด กฤษบำรุง (เบเนดิกโต ชุนกิม)]

priest of the archdiocese of Bangkok

born: 28 February 1895 in Sam Phran, Nakhon Pathom (Thailand)

competent forum: Bangkok

CCS protocol number: 2026

type of cause: martyrdom

rescript of nihil obstat: 07 March 1995

opening of diocesan inquiry: 13 January 1998

closing of diocesan inquiry: 23 January 1998

decree on validity of diocesan inquiry: 29 May 1998

publication of Positio: 1999

particular congress of theological consultors: 29 October 1999

ordinary session of cardinals and bishops: 11 January 2000

promulgation of decree on martyrdom: 27 January 2000

beatification: 05 March 2000

postulator: Rev. Diego Sáez Martín,omi

petitioner: Assumption Cathedral, Charoenkrung 40, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500, THAILAND

website: nicolasbunkerd.catholic.or.th

Note: The Thai scripts of this name have been Romanized using the method employed by the UNGEGN Working Group on Romanization Systems. Vatican documents, on the other hand, Romanize it as Nicholas Bunkerd (or Bunkert) Kitbamrung. The original family name, being Chinese in origin, may also be Romanized as Xunkim.

10) 24 March in Markowa, Łańcut (Poland)

JÓZEF AND VIKTORIA ULMA

AND THEIR SEVEN CHILDREN

1. JÓZEF ULMA

layperson of the diocese of Przemyśl of the Latins; married

born: 02 March 1900 in Markowa, Łańcut (Poland)

2. WIKTORIA NIEMCZAK ULMA

layperson of the diocese of Przemyśl of the Latins; married

born: 10 December 1912 in Markowa, Łańcut (Poland)

3. STANISŁAWA [Stasia] ULMA

child of the diocese of Przemyśl of the Latins

born: 18 July 1936 in Markowa, Łańcut (Poland)

4. BARBARA JADWIGA [Basia] ULMA

child of the diocese of Przemyśl of the Latins

born: 06 October 1937 in Markowa, Łańcut (Poland)

5. WŁADYSŁAW [Władziu] ULMA

child of the diocese of Przemyśl of the Latins

born: 05 December 1938 in Markowa, Łańcut (Poland)

6. FRANCISZEK [Franuś] ULMA

child of the diocese of Przemyśl of the Latins

born: 03 April 1940 in Markowa, Łańcut (Poland)

7. ANTONI [Antoś] ULMA

child of the diocese of Przemyśl of the Latins

born: 06 June 1941 in Markowa, Łańcut (Poland)

8. MARIA [Marysia] ULMA

child of the diocese of Przemyśl of the Latins

born: 16 September 1942 in Markowa, Łańcut (Poland)

9. UNNAMED ULMA CHILD (*)

born: 24 March 1944 in Markowa, Łańcut (Poland)

Note: On 5 September 2023, the Dicastery for Causes of Saints issued an official statement regarding the seventh unnamed Ulma child. It clarified that (1) Wiktoria Ulma was at an advanced state of pregnancy with her seventh child at the time of the massacre; (2) this child was born at the time of his mothers martyrdom; and (3) this unnamed child was added among the other Ulma children, having received a baptism of blood through the martyrdom of the parents.

competent forum: Przemyśl of the Latins

CCS protocol number: 3320

type of cause: martyrdom

rescript of nihil obstat: 18 February 2003

opening of diocesan inquiry: 17 September 2003

closing of diocesan inquiry: 24 May 2011

decree on validity of diocesan inquiry: 10 May 2014

rescript of transfer of competent forum: 20 February 2017 (from Pelplin)

session of historical consultors: 16 February 2021

publication of Positio: 2021

particular congress of theological consultors: 22 February 2022

ordinary session of cardinals and bishops: 06 December 2022

promulgation of decree on martyrdom: 17 December 2022

beatification: 10 September 2023

postulator: Rev. Witold Burda

petitioner: Archidiecezja Przemyska, pl. Katedralny 4a, 37-700 Przemyśl, POLAND

website: ulmowie.pl
